heading_align }}; } .instafeed-subheading-{{ section.id }} { margin: 0; margin-top: {{ subheading_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; } .instafeed-subheading-{{ section.id }} h1 .instafeed-subheading-{{ text-align: {{ subheading_align }}; } .instafeed-slider-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ slider_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; } .instafeed-slide-{{ section.id }} { display: block !important; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px; } .instafeed-slide-{{ section.id }} img, .instafeed-slide-{{ section.id }} svg { width: 100%; height: 100%; display: block; object-fit: cover; border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px; } .instafeed-btn-next-{{ section.id }}, .instafeed-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} { top: 50% !important; display: flex !important; border-radius: 50%; border: 1px solid {{ nav_border }} !important; width: {{ nav_size_mobile }}px !important; height: {{ nav_size_mobile }}px !important; background: {{ nav_btn_bg }} !important; transition: all 0.3s ease 0s; } .instafeed-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} { left: 5px !important; } .instafeed-btn-next-{{ section.id }} { right: 5px !important; } .instafeed-btn-next-{{ section.id }}::after, .instafeed-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}::after { font-size: {{ nav_size_mobile | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}px !important; color: {{ nav_icon }}; } .instafeed-btn-next-{{ section.id }}::after { margin-left: 2px; } .instafeed-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}::after { margin-left: -1px; } .instafeed-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover, .instafeed-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover { border: 1px solid {{ nav_border_hover }} !important; background: {{ nav_btn_hover_bg }} !important; } .instafeed-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover::after, .instafeed-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover::after { color: {{ nav_hover_icon }} !important; } @media(min-width: 768px) { .section-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { padding: 0 5rem;
